response.overview: TALES TOLD IN THE WOODS was presented in September 2011, as part of a site-specific festival called Open For Dancing, performed in the Yew Forest at Norman Bird Sanctuary in Middletown, Rhode Island. It was danced by a cast of 30, including 2 professional dancers from Island Moving Co, 4 small girls, 4 grown women, and students from Salve Regina College and IMC's own Junior Company.
response.title: Tales Told in the Woods
